abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column examines case of 64-year-old Mauricio Dominguez-Bernal, who traveled from Chile to New York City, with plans to stay for a month and spend his time stealing purses from women enjoying summer meals at Manhattan restaurants; Dominguez-Bernal was arrested just days before his return flight home, after detectives from Grand Larceny Division spotted him numerous times of security videos.
lead_paragraph: During a several-week period in New York City in June and July, a man with a distinctive gait was captured on camera stealing handbags in at least a dozen restaurants.

headline.main: Chasing the Serial Purse Snatcher With a Limp
headline.print_headline: On the Trail of a Serial Purse Snatcher With a Telltale Limp
